web_snippets: Max Felker-Kantor is an associate professor of history at Ball State University. He teaches courses in twentieth-century American and African American history.
Max Felker-Kantor's illuminating and highly original study demonstrates how the DARE program mirrored the LAPD's racialized practices.
Max Felker-Kantor is an associate professor of history at Ball State University. He teaches courses in twentieth-century American and African American history.
